{"rule":"MORFOLOGIK_RULE_EN_US","sentence":"^\\QBB </head> <body id=\"main\" onload=\"init();\"> <main> <div class=\"grid-container\"> <div class=\"grid-width-100\"> <label for=\"editor\"></label> <textarea name=\"editor\" id=\"editor\" title=\"Editor\" placeholder=\"Type article here.\"> </textarea> </div> </div> </main> <script> CKEDITOR.on('instanceReady', function (e) { document.querySelector(\"a.cke_button__maximize\").click(); }); const editor = CKEDITOR.replace('editor'); // Set editor width to 100% and height to 350px.\\E$"}
{"rule":"UPPERCASE_SENTENCE_START","sentence":"^\\Qeditor.resize( '100%', '350' ); </script> </body> </html>\\E$"}
